title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 13.7 - Producers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 13.7 - Producers

State Regulations

No person shall act as an insurance agent or an insurance broker in connection with a mass merchandising plan for any kind of insurance unless such person is duly licensed, under article 21 of the Insurance Law, as an agent or broker for such kind of insurance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
13.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
